thread.section_title: River Palace Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A nice cozy place well connected to the city
thread.title_full: A nice cozy place well connected to the city - Review of River Palace Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ameyaupradhan
title: A nice cozy place well connected to the city
text:
We visited this place in Jan 2017 when the winter was at its peak. First of all this place is very close to Flaminio metro station, so connectivity to the entire city is pretty good. We were in Rome for only 3 days so reducing travel time is very imported for us.
Talking about the hotel, it is very cozy and you will always be comfortable here. The rooms are small but looking at the location where the hotel is situated it's really a good return on investment.The breakfast served is really good and we
